short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Additional features for the attackpoint.org website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Attackpoint Plus is an extension designed to modify the Attackpoint website (attackpoint.org)

Current Features Include:

- Liking attackpoint discussion posts
- Liking attackpoint trainings

Coming Soon:

- Formatted discussion replies
